comments:
I posted on the BIRT news group first and was asked to file a report.  My newsgroup post is here:  http://www.eclipse.org/newsportal/article.php?id=11895&group=eclipse.birt#11895

I'm trying to chart a dataset and a subset on a scatter graph.  For the 
subset i'm using the expression builder with the line of code below.
if ((row["VALUE"]) > 10) row["VALUE"];


I wish to show the origional dataset allong with a subset of it where the values are greater than 10.  When i preview the chart i'm getting the error below. Can anyone help? 
Thanks



The following items have errors:
